T02TD3229E:4a-1: m'a r'i tsyee s'a dha nam /
T02TD3229E:4a-4: 'od zer can ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD3229E:4a-6: zhes bya ba rnams bdag nyid kyi mgo bo dang dpral ba dang /
T02TD3229E:4a-9: bus po gnyis po rnams la rnam par bsgoms la /
T02TD3229E:4a-10: yi ge aom las nges par grub pa'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i 'od zer can sku mdog dmar mo ste /
T02TD3229E:4a-11: zhal drug ma phyag bcu gnyis ma /
T02TD3229E:4a-13: dbu skra ser po gyen du 'bar bar gyur pa /
T02TD3229E:4a-15: sbrul gyi smad ka da ldan pa /
T02TD3229E:4a-16: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can /
T02TD3229E:4a-17: zhabs gnyis kyis bgegs kyi tshogs du ma kun nas mnan pa /
T02TD3229E:4a-18: mchod rten gyi nang na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la g-yas bskum pas bzhugs pa /
T02TD3229E:4a-19: rnam par snang mdzad dbu rgyan dang ldan pa /
T02TD3229E:4a-20: phag sna tshogs kyis 'dren pa'i shing rta la'o //
T02TD3229E:4a-23: ljang gu dang ser mo dang /
T02TD3229E:4a-24: dkar mo ni dang po la sogs pa'i zhal lnga pa'o//
T02TD3229E:4a-25: zhal gcig ni steng na ste phag gi zhal nag mo //
T02TD3229E:4a-26: g-yas kyi rnams na ni ral gri dang dbyug to dang mda' dang lcags kyu dang rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang mdung rnams so //
T02TD3229E:4a-27: g-yon gyi rnams na ni zhags pha dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub dang thod pa dang /
T02TD3229E:4a-28: shing mya ngan med lo 'dab dang bcas pa dang /
T02TD3229E:4b-2: mdung thung rtse gsum pa rnams bsnams par mdzad do //
T02TD3229E:4b-3: spyan gsum ma ljags 'dril bar mdzad pa /
T02TD3229E:4b-4: zhal mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa /
T02TD3229E:4b-5: shin tu 'jigs pa chen por mdzad par bsam par bya ba'o //
T02TD3229E:4b-6: shing rta'i nang du phyag gnyis ma sdigs mdzub dang shing mya ngan med lo 'dab dang ldan pa phyag na bsnams shing shing rta bskyod par mdzad pa /
T02TD3229E:4b-7: gdan la zhabs g-yas bskum pas gnas pa /
T02TD3229E:4b-8: 'jigs su rung bar mdzad par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD3229E:4b-9: spro ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas ma rungs pa'i sems can rnams rengs par gyis shig rmongs par gyis shig choms shig / aom rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma /
T02TD3229E:4b-10: sems can ma rungs pa thams cad ha na ha na da ha da ha pa tsa pa tsa aom 'od zer can aom h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD3229E:4b-11: zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di bzlas par bya ba'o //
T02TD3229E:4b-12: 'od zer can gyi sgrub thabs so //
T02TD3229E:4b-13: aa bha ya'i zhal snga nas dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o//
